traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The hag can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spellâ€™s normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11): Augury, Find Familiar, Identify, Locate Object, Scrying, or Unseen Servant. The hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.description: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations only with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The hag makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks):
At Will: Dancing Lights, Disguise Self (24-hour duration), Invisibility (self only, and the hag leaves no tracks while Invisible), Minor Illusion, Ray of Sickness (level 3 version)
